verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on EASar

frameset.edef: to witness, be a contemporary of

example.parse: المخرج التشادي محمد صالح هارون البالغ من العمر 50 عاما عاصر الحروب التي عاشتها بلاده.

arg.g: The Chadian producer Muhammad Saalih Haruun, 50 years

arg.g: the wars his country has been involved in
